original_text: Tell my father about all the honor accorded me in Egypt and about everything you have seen. And bring my father down here quickly.”
korean_text: 당신들은 내가 애굽에서 누리는 영화와 당신들이 본 모든 것을 다 내 아버지께 아뢰고 속히 모시고 내려오소서 하며

sentences.original_text: Tell my father about all the honor
and about everything you have seen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 본 모든 것에 대해서

sentences.original_text: And bring my father down here quickly
